Uses of Interface
edu.northwestern.at.utils.math.matrix.Matrix

Packages that use Matrix
Package
Description
edu.northwestern.at.utils.math.matrix
Methods for working with two-dimensional matrices stored as arrays of doubles.
edu.northwestern.at.utils.math.statistics
Methods and interfaces for statistical computations.

  • Uses of Matrix in edu.northwestern.at.utils.math.matrix

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractMatrix
    Abstract class which implements Matrix interface.
    class 
    DenseMatrix
    Implements a matrix as a dense two-dimensional array of doubles.
    class 
    SparseMatrix
    Implements a sparse matrix using a hash map.
